name: CSV
description: Load and create data in comma-separated value (CSV) format.

conditions.name: On parse error
conditions.description: Triggered when using the 'Parse' action with invalid data.

conditions.name: On parse success
conditions.description: Triggered when the 'Parse' action completes successfully.

actions.name: Parse CSV
actions.description: Parse data from a CSV file and store the result in an Array object.
actions.display_text: Parse CSV from string [i]{0}[/i] in to {2} (delimiter [i]{1}[/i], data type [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: CSV
params.description: A string of comma-separated values to parse.

params.name: Array
params.description: Choose an array object to store the resulting data in.

params.name: Data type
params.description: Choose the data type to read values.

actions.name: Generate CSV
actions.description: Convert data in a two-dimensional Array object back in to CSV data.

params.name: Array
params.description: Choose an array object to convert to CSV.

expressions.name: GeneratedCSV
expressions.description: Get the generated string of CSV data after the 'Generate CSV' action.

expressions.name: TabCharacter
expressions.description: A tab character, which can be useful as a delimiter.
